name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShopifyHunt - Shopify & Aliexpress Spy and Dropship Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We conducted a comprehensive analysis of Shopify and AliExpress to help you quickly understand stores and identify niche products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Comprehensive analysis of Shopify stores, including store products, advertising traffic, sales, etc., to help you quickly understand any store.

Supports analysis of AliExpress products and multiple products from list pages, helping you quickly find niche products. Single product analysis is more detailed, further assisting you in evaluating product strengths and weaknesses. Product reviews are also analyzed to obtain consumer purchase motivations and expectations. It supports searching for identical sources of goods on platforms like 1688, AliExpress, and Shopify.

ShopifyHunt is your best tool for monitoring e-commerce, independent websites, and dropshipping business competitors. Our tool helps you uncover your competitors' profit secrets. With just one click, you can dive deep into competitors' product research and pricing strategies. Apply these award-winning techniques to your dropshipping business, and your independent or dropshipping store will become increasingly popular. Your sales will rise faster than you ever imagined!

With a comprehensive analysis of each product on AliExpress and daily recommendations of top-selling items, you will never have to worry about what to sell next! Use ShopifyHunt to quickly compare prices and evaluate seller reputations to maximize your profit margin! You can also gain insights into Shopify competitors selling the same products, allowing you to make more informed decisions!

ğŸ‘‹ ğŸ‘‹ What are the main features? 
ğŸ’° 1. AliExpress Product Research With ShopifyHunt, you can find lower-priced, higher-selling similar products just by searching with an image. For each product, it provides: 
â¡ï¸ Product overview, including orders, wishlist, price, profit, and release date. 
â¡ï¸ Product review analysis and statistics. 
â¡ï¸ Trends in recent order volume, wishlist, and prices to reflect the product's recent market performance. 
â¡ï¸ Concise customer feedback analysis. 
â¡ï¸ Shipping reports based on different logistics options. 
â¡ï¸ A list of Shopify competitors selling the same product, giving you insights into the competition.  
ğŸ’° 2. Intelligent Product Recommendations ShopifyHunt provides two types of recommendations: one based on product similarity and the other on sales volume. 
â¡ï¸ Easily find products similar to the one you're viewing while assessing the reputation of corresponding AliExpress sellers. This way, you can compare prices and lower costs, maximizing profits. 
â¡ï¸ Unsure what to sell today? Check out our AI-selected popular products! We pick 40 of the best-selling AliExpress products daily, based on sales over the past 7 or 14 days. You can find them on the homepage, category page, and search result pages. 
 ğŸ’° 3. Download Product Videos, Images We understand your next step after finding a product to sell â€” listing it in your own store. Thatâ€™s why we offer unlimited access to download product images, including videos, main images, variant images, and description images! 
ğŸ’° 4. Search for Similar AliExpress Products Using Images You can search for products on AliExpress by image/photo (right-click any image on a webpage, then press the â€œShopifyHuntâ€ button). 
ğŸ’° 5. Download Product Reviews We offer unlimited access to download product reviews, including review content and buyer showcases. 

How does this tool work? 
â— Automatically identifies independent e-commerce stores. 
â— Provides a list of store products that can be filtered by category. 
â— Exports all or some store product data to Excel/CSV files. 
â— Produces CSV files compatible with independent store imports. 
â— Includes all store product list fields, such as title, vendor, description, creation and update dates, tags, prices, variants, images, etc. 
â— No limit on the number of stores or products. 
â— Completely free.

How to use this tool on Shopify? 
â— Visit any independent store you want to monitor through the Chrome browser. 
â— Click the extension icon. 
â— Select all or some of the products. 
â— Click the "Export to Excel/CSV" button in the pop-up window. 
â— You can then export product information to Excel/CSV files, and these files will be compatible with the store's backend import format.

How to use this tool on AliExpress? Install it in your Chrome browser, visit aliexpress.com, and the extension will automatically perform all tasks for you!

You will find bestseller charts on the homepage, category pages, and search result pages.
Each result under your search will display an additional extension info panel, showing key data about the product.
Click the floating ShopifyHunt icon on the product detail page, and you will be impressed by the detailed product and store analysis.
With this automatic store parser & AliExpress product analysis tool, you can launch store monitoring in one click and outsmart your competitors!
long.sk,sl,sr:
The must-have Shopify&Dropship tool for Dropshipping sellers.

This is a shopify store analysis tool helps you inspect your competitors' stores product strategy and their best selling products. Make unbelievable profits for your Store in dropshipping business!

Main Feature
(1) Store Analysis
â— Automatically identify Shopify stores. 
â— Analysis store information including: store name, theme, product price and so on.
â— Show the new addad products and best selling products
â— Provide the release trend of products, vendor distribute analysis, & product tag analysis.

(2) Store's products
â— Show the bestselling products and new added products of the Store.
â— Provide a list of products that can be filtered by category
â— All product listing field including title, price, images and so onï¼Œand provide links to help you easily find the products you want to see
â— Export products data to Excel/CSV document, which is compatible with Shopify store import, then you can upload them directly to your own store

(3) Live Sales
â— Check out the live sales of any Shopify stores,  find the most popular products.
â— Simply keep the page open and you will be able to count the sales of the store and the products sold during the period.

 (4) Review Export
â— Free Download all reviews.
â— You can import the downloaded reviews directly into your online store.

(5) Apps and Tools
â— Reveal the secret apps that drive sales for your competitor stores.

How to use ShopifyHunt?
Visit any Shopify store with Chrome that you want to analysis, and view all the informtion on the extension panel.

The term 'Shopify' is a trademark of Shopify,Inc. This application uses the Shopify API but is not endorsed or certified by Shopify
